overview: Tap-ji lives with his father, mother, older brother, and younger brother, who are instrumentalists. Yang Jong-ha, a friend of Tap-ji, is a popular baseball star. Yang Jong-ha becomes friends with Tap in a lonely environment. However, when Kok-ji hears that Yang Jong-ha has a girlfriend, he is heartbroken and dedicates all his heart to helping a struggling student to forget Jong-ha.
title: The Warm-hearted Girl Gok-ji
